price: ߊ߲ߠߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߟߐ߬ߦߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߡߊߟߐ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
